text: The 2016–17 season is Zamalek's 58th season in the Egyptian Premier League and 58th consecutive season in the top flight of Egyptian football. The club will participate in the Premier League, Egypt Cup, Super Cup, and the CAF Champions League. ==Team kit== The team kits for this season are manufactured by Joma. {| border-"0" | | | | | |} ==Players== ==Transfers== ===Players in=== {|width=65% class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%; text- align:left" !Date !Position !Name !From !Fee !Type !Source |---- | 8 May 2016|| FW|| Khaled Kamar || Smouha || Free || End of Loan ||| |---- | 2016|| DF|| Shawky El Said || Ismaily || || ||| |---- | 2016|| DF|| Ali Fathy || || || ||| |---- | 3 July 2016|| DF|| Islam Gamal || Ismaily || Free || End of Loan ||| |---- | 11 July 2016|| MF|| Ibrahim Salah || Smouha || Free || End of Loan ||| |---- | rowspan=3 | 19 July 2016|| MF|| M.
